title: 26 of the Best Black Friday Sephora Deals, According to a Shopping Editor
description: The Black Friday sales are still in full swing, but hurry, they'll be over before you know it. Right now, you can score hidden deals and discounts on all things beauty at Sephora. Now is the perfect time to stock up on skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, nail care, and more at incredible price cuts. You can even get a head start on gift shopping. We curated a list of the best Black Friday Sephora deals you can shop right now, including markdowns on holiday gift sets. Looking for a bold new lippie? Score deals on an array of lipsticks nearly half off. We also found deals on brands like Urban Decay, Khiel's, Skinfix, and Briogeo. Our Favorite Black Friday Sephora Deals to Shop A lip balm restock: Glossier Limited Edition Biscotti and Espresso Balm Dotcom Duo at $22, originally $27. A set of hydrating lip oils: Fenty Skin Fruit Quench'rz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil Trio at $37, originally $52. A gift set for the skin-care lover: Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault Set at $51, originally $98. Hydrating undereye patches: Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit at $68, originally $85. A hair tool that can do it all: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze at $499, originally $599. Stock up on your favorites, try something new, or shop for the beauty lover on your list. Keep reading to shop our top deals. Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on Nov. 30, 2024 at 6:45 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: Shop the best early Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals from Sephora, including discounts on skin care, makeup, hair care, and more.
text: SephoraWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.The Black Friday sales are still in full swing, but hurry, they'll be over before you know it. Right now, you can score hidden deals and discounts on all things beauty at Sephora. Now is the perfect time to stock up on skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, nail care, and more at incredible price cuts. You can even get a head start on gift shopping. We curated a list of the best Black Friday Sephora deals you can shop right now, including markdowns on holiday gift sets. Looking for a bold new lippie? Score deals on an array of lipsticks nearly half off. We also found deals on brands like Urban Decay, Khiel's, Skinfix, and Briogeo. Our Favorite Black Friday Sephora Deals to Shop A lip balm restock: Glossier Limited Edition Biscotti and Espresso Balm Dotcom Duo at $22, originally $27. A set of hydrating lip oils: Fenty Skin Fruit Quench'rz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil Trio at $37, originally $52. A gift set for the skin-care lover: Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault Set at $51, originally $98. Hydrating undereye patches: Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit at $68, originally $85. A hair tool that can do it all: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze at $499, originally $599. Stock up on your favorites, try something new, or shop for the beauty lover on your list. Keep reading to shop our top deals. Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on Nov. 30, 2024 at 6:45 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Glitter EyeshadowUrban Decay 24/7 Moondust Eyeshadow ($12, originally $24) Urban Decay's Space Cowboy glittery eyeshadow is going viral and now's your chance to score half off along with the other sparkling shades. It's perfect as an eyeshadow topper and delivers a gorgeous wet look. It's also a great stocking stuffer for the beauty lover in your life.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Liquid EyelinerUrban Decay 24/7 Inks Easy Ergonomic Liquid Eyeliner Pen ($14, originally $28) Need to stock up on eyeliner? This pigmented liquid liner is half off at Sephora. The waterproof formula is smudge- and fade-proof, and the felt tip allows for a precise application. It comes in nine colors.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Lip LinerRefy Lip Sculpt ($21, originally $26) Refy's innovative Lip Sculpt is on sale, and you can achieve a long-lasting, defined lip with this product. The dual-ended lippie has a lip liner on one end and a clear, setting formula that sets your liner in place. It comes in pink and neutral-toned shades.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Body LotionOle Henriksen BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer ($23, originally $38) Ole Henriksen's BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer is a hydrating and exfoliating lotion worth stocking up on during the colder months. The AHAs gently smooth out and brighten your skin while deeply conditioning the skin.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a MoisturizerFirst Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration ($24, originally $48) The bestselling First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration is currently half off and it's worth stocking up on for all your dry skin needs this winter. This rich moisturizer infuses hydration into the skin and soothes the skin with colloidal oatmeal without feeling heavy.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a PrimerMilk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer ($25, originally $38) The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer is a bestseller for a reason, and it's 34 percent off right now. Its hydrating formula gives your skin the perfect base for any foundation to stay put, while being flexible and skin-like.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on an Eye CreamSunday Riley Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles ($33, originally $65) If you wake up with puffy eyes or couldn't sleep the prior night, the Sunday Riley Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream is worth buying nearly half off. It will brighten with the help of vitamin C and niacinamide and depuff with the help of caffeine. It also illuminates with a pearlescent finish to brighten dark circles instantly.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Cool-Toned Eyeshadow PaletteNatasha Denona My Dream Eyeshadow Palette ($35, originally $69) If you're looking for a cool-toned pink palette for romantic looks, this one from Natasha Denona is on a major markdown. At nearly half off, it's rare to see a Natasha Denona palette go on sale. This is also a great gift for the makeup lover in your life.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on FoundationNars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation ($36, originally $52) The Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation delivers a long-lasting wear without the dryness. It is buildable and gives you 16 hours of fade-resistant wear. It's the perfect time to stock up on this foundation while it's on sale.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Cleansing BalmClinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover ($37, originally $58) There's no better time to stock up on the value size of the Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm. A small dollop can break down heavy-duty makeup, sunscreen, sweat, dirt, and grime, leaving your skin clean without feeling stripped.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Warm-Toned Eyeshadow PaletteToo Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette ($38, originally $54) Whether you're shopping for a makeup lover or just looking to treat yourself, snag the Too Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette on sale right now. You can create an array of colorful looks, keep it neutral, or go glam with shimmers.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Lip Gloss SetInnbeauty Project Glaze For Days Lip Oil Holiday Kit ($39, originally $49) Get four shades of Innbeauty Project's bestselling hydrating, high-shine lip oils with this holiday kit that's $10 off. The shades deliver a wash of color along with a fun scent. You can also get it as a gift for the beauty lover in your life.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a Sensitive Skin Gift SetSkinfix The Barrier Bundle Hydrating + Plumping Trio ($52, originally $69) Skinfix is a great brand to shop if you have sensitive skin. This bundle of skin barrier-nourishing products will help hydrate and calm your skin, especially with winter dryness. This set comes with the brand's bestselling Triple Lipid-Peptide Refillable Cream and travel sizes of a gentle cleanser and niacinamide serum. It's a great gift for the skin-care lover in your life, too.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on a LipstickTom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color ($53, originally $62) Available on sale in six shades, the Tom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color is a luxe find you can treat yourself to for the holiday season. It's a hydrating pigmented formula that feels lightweight and delivers a high-shine finish.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on Eye PatchesPeter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit ($68, originally $85) If undereye patches are a core part of your getting-ready routine, this full size set from Peter Thomas Roth is a must. It comes with three types of hydra-gel eye patches for hydration, firming, and brightening. Each container comes with 60 patches so you'll get 180 in total â€” a steal!sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on Shark Hair ToolsShark Beauty SmoothStyle Heated Comb + Blow Dryer Brush ($69, originally $99) This blow dryer brush has a built-in heated comb that delivers smoothing effects without the hair becoming flat. You can use the blow dryer brush mode on wet and dry hair, while the heated comb mode is ideal for styling and touch-ups. If you rely on blow dryer brushes for your styling needs, this tool is all you need, and it's $30 off. You can also consider getting the Shark Beauty Wicked x Shark FlexStyle> ($229, originally $299) if you want a multistyler hair tool that can do it all.sephora.comBest Sephora Deal on Glossier PerfumeGlossier You Eau de Parfum Set ($80, originally $94) Glossier's You perfume is a bestseller that makes for a perfect gift for the holidays, and it's on sale. This woody and earthy scent is unisex and layerable. It's warm and familiar but smells unique on everyone's skin.Anvita Reddy (she/her) is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She tests skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

The Black Friday sales are still in full swing, but hurry, they'll be over before you know it. Right now, you can score hidden deals and discounts on all things beauty at Sephora. Now is the perfect time to stock up on skin care, makeup, hair care, body care, nail care, and more at incredible price cuts. You can even get a head start on gift shopping.

We curated a list of the best Black Friday Sephora deals you can shop right now, including markdowns on holiday gift sets. Looking for a bold new lippie? Score deals on an array of lipsticks nearly half off. We also found deals on brands like Urban Decay, Khiel's, Skinfix, and Briogeo.

Our Favorite Black Friday Sephora Deals to Shop

  • A lip balm restock: Glossier Limited Edition Biscotti and Espresso Balm Dotcom Duo at $22, originally $27.
  • A set of hydrating lip oils: Fenty Skin Fruit Quench'rz Hydrating + Strengthening Lip Oil Trio at $37, originally $52.
  • A gift set for the skin-care lover: Kiehl's Since 1851 Keeping Up With Kiehl's Holiday Vault Set at $51, originally $98.
  • Hydrating undereye patches: Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit at $68, originally $85.
  • A hair tool that can do it all: Dyson Special Edition Airwrap Multi-Styler Complete Long in Strawberry Bronze at $499, originally $599.

Stock up on your favorites, try something new, or shop for the beauty lover on your list. Keep reading to shop our top deals.

Looking for even more sales? Shop more of PS's Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals, and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations.

Update on Nov. 30, 2024 at 6:45 p.m. ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Best Sephora Deal on a Glitter Eyeshadow

Urban Decay 24/7 Moondust Eyeshadow ($12, originally $24)

Urban Decay's Space Cowboy glittery eyeshadow is going viral and now's your chance to score half off along with the other sparkling shades. It's perfect as an eyeshadow topper and delivers a gorgeous wet look. It's also a great stocking stuffer for the beauty lover in your life.

Best Sephora Deal on a Liquid Eyeliner

Urban Decay 24/7 Inks Easy Ergonomic Liquid Eyeliner Pen ($14, originally $28)

Need to stock up on eyeliner? This pigmented liquid liner is half off at Sephora. The waterproof formula is smudge- and fade-proof, and the felt tip allows for a precise application. It comes in nine colors.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lip Liner

Refy Lip Sculpt ($21, originally $26)

Refy's innovative Lip Sculpt is on sale, and you can achieve a long-lasting, defined lip with this product. The dual-ended lippie has a lip liner on one end and a clear, setting formula that sets your liner in place. It comes in pink and neutral-toned shades.

Best Sephora Deal on a Body Lotion

Ole Henriksen BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer ($23, originally $38)

Ole Henriksen's BeamCream Smoothing Body Moisturizer is a hydrating and exfoliating lotion worth stocking up on during the colder months. The AHAs gently smooth out and brighten your skin while deeply conditioning the skin.

Best Sephora Deal on a Moisturizer

First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration ($24, originally $48)

The bestselling First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream Intense Hydration is currently half off and it's worth stocking up on for all your dry skin needs this winter. This rich moisturizer infuses hydration into the skin and soothes the skin with colloidal oatmeal without feeling heavy.

Best Sephora Deal on a Primer

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer ($25, originally $38)

The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Gripping Primer is a bestseller for a reason, and it's 34 percent off right now. Its hydrating formula gives your skin the perfect base for any foundation to stay put, while being flexible and skin-like.

Best Sephora Deal on an Eye Cream

Sunday Riley Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream for Dark Circles ($33, originally $65)

If you wake up with puffy eyes or couldn't sleep the prior night, the Sunday Riley Auto Correct Brightening + Depuffing Eye Cream is worth buying nearly half off. It will brighten with the help of vitamin C and niacinamide and depuff with the help of caffeine. It also illuminates with a pearlescent finish to brighten dark circles instantly.

Best Sephora Deal on a Cool-Toned Eyeshadow Palette

Natasha Denona My Dream Eyeshadow Palette ($35, originally $69)

If you're looking for a cool-toned pink palette for romantic looks, this one from Natasha Denona is on a major markdown. At nearly half off, it's rare to see a Natasha Denona palette go on sale. This is also a great gift for the makeup lover in your life.

Best Sephora Deal on Foundation

Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation ($36, originally $52)

The Nars Natural Radiant Longwear Foundation delivers a long-lasting wear without the dryness. It is buildable and gives you 16 hours of fade-resistant wear. It's the perfect time to stock up on this foundation while it's on sale.

Best Sephora Deal on a Cleansing Balm

Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover ($37, originally $58)

There's no better time to stock up on the value size of the Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm. A small dollop can break down heavy-duty makeup, sunscreen, sweat, dirt, and grime, leaving your skin clean without feeling stripped.

Best Sephora Deal on a Warm-Toned Eyeshadow Palette

Too Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette ($38, originally $54)

Whether you're shopping for a makeup lover or just looking to treat yourself, snag the Too Faced Better Than Chocolate Eyeshadow Palette on sale right now. You can create an array of colorful looks, keep it neutral, or go glam with shimmers.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lip Gloss Set

Innbeauty Project Glaze For Days Lip Oil Holiday Kit ($39, originally $49)

Get four shades of Innbeauty Project's bestselling hydrating, high-shine lip oils with this holiday kit that's $10 off. The shades deliver a wash of color along with a fun scent. You can also get it as a gift for the beauty lover in your life.

Best Sephora Deal on a Sensitive Skin Gift Set

Skinfix The Barrier Bundle Hydrating + Plumping Trio ($52, originally $69)

Skinfix is a great brand to shop if you have sensitive skin. This bundle of skin barrier-nourishing products will help hydrate and calm your skin, especially with winter dryness. This set comes with the brand's bestselling Triple Lipid-Peptide Refillable Cream and travel sizes of a gentle cleanser and niacinamide serum. It's a great gift for the skin-care lover in your life, too.

Best Sephora Deal on a Lipstick

Tom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color ($53, originally $62)

Available on sale in six shades, the Tom Ford Ultra Shine Lip Color is a luxe find you can treat yourself to for the holiday season. It's a hydrating pigmented formula that feels lightweight and delivers a high-shine finish.

Best Sephora Deal on Eye Patches

Peter Thomas Roth Eyes In The Sky 3-Piece Kit ($68, originally $85)

If undereye patches are a core part of your getting-ready routine, this full size set from Peter Thomas Roth is a must. It comes with three types of hydra-gel eye patches for hydration, firming, and brightening. Each container comes with 60 patches so you'll get 180 in total â€” a steal!

Best Sephora Deal on Shark Hair Tools

Shark Beauty SmoothStyle Heated Comb + Blow Dryer Brush ($69, originally $99)

This blow dryer brush has a built-in heated comb that delivers smoothing effects without the hair becoming flat. You can use the blow dryer brush mode on wet and dry hair, while the heated comb mode is ideal for styling and touch-ups. If you rely on blow dryer brushes for your styling needs, this tool is all you need, and it's $30 off.

You can also consider getting the Shark Beauty Wicked x Shark FlexStyle> ($229, originally $299) if you want a multistyler hair tool that can do it all.

Best Sephora Deal on Glossier Perfume

Glossier You Eau de Parfum Set ($80, originally $94)

Glossier's You perfume is a bestseller that makes for a perfect gift for the holidays, and it's on sale. This woody and earthy scent is unisex and layerable. It's warm and familiar but smells unique on everyone's skin.

Anvita Reddy (she/her) is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and reviews home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She tests skin care, makeup, and hair care, plus countless other beauty products.
